dmca.title: Singlesdatingdirect.com and datingservicedirect.com
dmca.body:
We are in receipt of you DMCA Complaint dated March 22, 2006. The disputed
material in the above-referenced letter is the domain name, not the content
of the website. As an ISP, we are compelled by Federal Law to disable access
of website if it infringes copyright or trademark rights of third parties.
This is not the case since the website www.singlesdatingdirect.com and
datingservicedirect.com neither uses the Trademark Dating Direct on his
website nor has Dating Direct content display there. As the disputed
material is the domain name and it is not under our control, because it was
not registered with us. This issue should be resolved either by the
registrar of the domain name www.singlesdatingdirect.com and
datingservicedirect.com or ICANN.

Legal Response Team


-----Original Message-----
From: Adlex Solicitors [mailto:djg@adlexsolicitors.co.uk] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 22, 2006 11:27 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Cc: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: Singlesdatingdirect.com and datingservicedirect.com 

ThePlanet.com

Dear Sirs

www.singlesdatingdirect.com and datingservicedirect.com (
